00023 /* bus protocol format
00024  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00025  * |0xFE|0xFE|to-adr|fm-adr|checksum|cmd|length|data|data|data|data|0xFD|
00026  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00027  *
00028  * The length of a message is total length - 7 bytes (premble, to-adr, fm-adr,checksum,cmd,length,postamble)
00029  *
00030  */
00031

00058 bus_status_struct bus_status;
00059 
00061 unsigned char calc_checksum = 0;
00062 
00064 BUS_MESSAGE bus_new_message;
00065 
00068 unsigned char timer_bus_timeout = 0;
00069 
00072 unsigned int counter_sync_timeout = 0;
00073 
00075 unsigned int counter_130us = 0;

00078 void bus_init(void) {
00079         rx_queue_init();
00080         tx_queue_init();
00081 
00082         #ifndef DEVICE_TYPE_COMPUTER
00083                 //57.600kpbs
00084                 bus_usart_init(15);
00085         #endif
00086 
00087         bus_status.flags = 0;
00088 
00089         /* Calculate the lower limit of the bus time frame */
00090         bus_status.lower_limit = (bus_status.ext_addr * BUS_TIME_FRAME_LIMIT + BUS_SLOT_DEAD_TIME) / BUS_TIME_INTERRUPT_INTERVAL;
00091         /* Calculate the upper limit of the bus time frame */
00092         bus_status.upper_limit = (bus_status.ext_addr * BUS_TIME_FRAME_LIMIT + BUS_TIME_FRAME_LIMIT - BUS_SLOT_DEAD_TIME) / BUS_TIME_INTERRUPT_INTERVAL;
00093 
00094         bus_status.device_count = 0;
00095 
00096         bus_status.frame_counter = 0;
00097 
00098         bus_reset_tx_status();
00099         bus_reset_rx_status();
00100         
00101         bus_ping_init();
00102         
00103         bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_RECEIVE_ON);
00104 }
00105 
00108 void bus_set_address(unsigned char addr) {
00109         bus_status.ext_addr = addr;
00110 }
00111 
00114 unsigned char bus_allowed_to_send(void) {
00115         if (bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_MASTER_SENT_SYNC_BIT))// && (bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_ALLOWED_TO_SEND_BIT)))
00116                 return(1);
00117         else
00118                 return(0);
00119 }
00120 
00123 unsigned char bus_get_address(void) {
00124         return(bus_status.ext_addr);
00125 }
00126 
00128 void bus_send_message(void) {
00129         /* Indicates that a message is currently being transmitted */
00130         bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_ACTIVE);
00131 
00132         /* Turn off the receive enable, this is turned on again in the USART
00133          * Transmit interrupt. Used to know when we are sending and somebody else */
00134         bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_RECEIVE_ON);
00135 
00136         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message = tx_queue_get();
00137 
00138 
00139         #ifndef DEVICE_TYPE_COMPUTER
00140                 bus_usart_transmit(BUS_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00141                 bus_usart_transmit(BUS_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00142                 bus_usart_transmit(bus_message.from_addr);
00143                 bus_usart_transmit(bus_message.to_addr);
00144                 bus_usart_transmit(bus_message.checksum);
00145                 bus_usart_transmit(bus_message.flags);
00146                 bus_usart_transmit(bus_message.cmd);
00147                 bus_usart_transmit(bus_message.length);
00148 
00149                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00150                         bus_usart_transmit(bus_message.data[i]);
00151 
00152                 bus_usart_transmit(BUS_MSG_POSTAMBLE);
00153         #endif
00154 
00155         // If the message is sent as an broadcast then we don't want any replies from the other units
00156         // and no resends will be made which means that we should drop the message from the TX queue.
00157         // This is also the case when it's just an ACK of a package or a NACK since we don't get any
00158         // confirmation of these anyway.
00159         if ((bus_message.to_addr == BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR) || (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_ACK) || (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_NACK)) {
00160                 bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_MESSAGE_ACK_TIMEOUT);
00161                 tx_queue_drop();
00162                 bus_reset_tx_status();
00163         }
00164         else {
00165                 //Reset the timeout counter for resends
00166                 bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_MESSAGE_ACK_TIMEOUT);
00167                 bus_status.wraparounds = 0;
00168         }
00169 
00170         /* Indicates that a message is currently NOT being transmitted */
00171         bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_ACTIVE);
00172 }
00173 
00175 void __inline__ bus_reset_tx_status(void) {
00176         bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_MESSAGE);
00177 
00178         bus_status.wraparounds = 0;
00179         bus_status.send_count = 0;
00180 }
00181 
00183 void __inline__ bus_reset_rx_status(void) {
00184         bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_PREAMBLE_FOUND_BIT);
00185         
00186         bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_ALLOWED_TO_SEND_BIT);
00187         
00188         bus_status.char_count = 0;
00189         calc_checksum = 0;
00190         bus_status.prev_char = 0;
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00196 unsigned char bus_is_master(void) {
00197         if (bus_status.flags & (1<< BUS_STATUS_DEVICE_IS_MASTER_BIT))
00198                 return(1);
00199         else
00200                 return(0);
00201 }
00202 
00206 void bus_set_is_master(unsigned char state, unsigned char count) {
00207         if (state) {
00208                 bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_DEVICE_IS_MASTER_BIT);
00209 
00210                 bus_status.device_count = count;
00211                 bus_status.device_count_mult = bus_status.device_count * BUS_TIME_MULTIPLIER;
00212 
00213                 if (!(bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_ALLOWED_TO_SEND_BIT)))
00214                         bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_FORCE_SYNC);
00215         }
00216         else
00217                 bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_DEVICE_IS_MASTER_BIT);
00218 }
00219 
00223 void bus_send_nack(unsigned char to_addr, unsigned char error_type) {
00224         if (to_addr != BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR)
00225                 bus_add_tx_message(bus_status.ext_addr,to_addr, 0, BUS_CMD_NACK, 1, &error_type);
00226 }
00227 
00229 void bus_send_ack(unsigned char to_addr) {
00230         bus_add_tx_message(bus_status.ext_addr,to_addr, 0, BUS_CMD_ACK, 0, NULL);
00231 }
00232 
00235 unsigned char bus_get_device_count(void) {
00236         return (bus_status.device_count);
00237 }
00238 
00241 void bus_set_device_count(unsigned char device_count) {
00242         bus_status.device_count = device_count;
00243 
00244         bus_status.device_count_mult = bus_status.device_count*BUS_TIME_MULTIPLIER;
00245 }
00246 
00248 void  bus_resend_message(void) {
00249         if (bus_status.send_count < BUS_MAX_RESENDS) {
00250                 bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_MESSAGE);
00251         }
00252         else {
00253                 #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00254                         led_set_error(LED_STATE_ON);
00255                         
00256                         //Set the error flag
00257                         event_set_error(ERROR_TYPE_BUS_RESEND,1);
00258                 #endif
00259                         
00260                 tx_queue_drop();
00261                 bus_reset_tx_status();
00262         }
00263 }
00264 
00266 void bus_check_tx_status(void) {
00267         if ((bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_TIME_SLOT_ACTIVE)) && (bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_ALLOWED_TO_SEND_BIT))) {
00268                 if (bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_MESSAGE)) {
00269                         bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_MESSAGE);
00270 
00271                         bus_status.send_count++;
00272                         bus_send_message();
00273                 }
00274         }
00275         else if (bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_FORCE_SYNC)) {
00276                 bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_MESSAGE);
00277                 bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_FORCE_SYNC);
00278 
00279                 bus_status.send_count++;
00280                 bus_send_message();
00281         }
00282 }
00283 
00291 void bus_add_tx_message(unsigned char from_addr, unsigned char to_addr, unsigned char flags, unsigned char cmd, unsigned char length, unsigned char data[]) {
00292         if ((cmd == BUS_CMD_SYNC) || (bus_allowed_to_send() != 0)) {
00293                 unsigned char checksum = 0;
00294 
00295                 BUS_MESSAGE bus_message;
00296 
00297                 bus_message.from_addr = from_addr;
00298                 bus_message.to_addr = to_addr;
00299                 bus_message.flags = flags;
00300                 checksum += flags;
00301                 bus_message.cmd = cmd;
00302                 checksum += cmd;
00303                 bus_message.length = length;
00304                 checksum += length;             
00305 
00306                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<length;i++) {
00307                         checksum += data[i];
00308                         bus_message.data[i] = data[i];
00309                 }
00310                 
00311                 bus_message.checksum = checksum;
00312 
00313                 tx_queue_add(bus_message);
00314         }
00315 }
00316 
00324 void bus_add_rx_message(unsigned char from_addr, unsigned char to_addr, unsigned char flags, unsigned char cmd, unsigned char length, unsigned char data[]) {
00325         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message;
00326 
00327         bus_message.from_addr = from_addr;
00328         bus_message.to_addr = to_addr;
00329         bus_message.flags = flags;
00330         bus_message.cmd = cmd;  
00331         bus_message.length = length;
00332 
00333         for (unsigned char i=0;i<length;i++) {
00334                 bus_message.data[i] = data[i];
00335         }
00336 
00337         rx_queue_add(bus_message);
00338 }
00339 
00341 void bus_add_new_message(void) {
00342         rx_queue_add(bus_new_message);
00343 }
00344 
00348 void bus_message_nacked(unsigned char addr, unsigned char error_type) {
00349         bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_MESSAGE_ACK_TIMEOUT);
00350 
00351         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message;
00352         
00353         bus_message = tx_queue_get();
00354         
00355         //We need to make sure that this NACK was actually from the address we expected
00356         //Otherwise there is a risk that another device which has gotten corrupted information
00357         //will send a NACK to this device, even though the message wasn't supposed to be from that unit
00358         if (bus_message.to_addr == addr)
00359                 bus_resend_message();
00360 }
00361 
00363 void bus_message_acked(unsigned char addr) {
00364         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message;
00365         
00366         bus_message = tx_queue_get();
00367         
00368         //We need to make sure that this ACK was actually from the address we expected
00369         //Otherwise there is a risk that another device which has gotten corrupted information
00370         //will send a ACK to this device, even though the message wasn't supposed to be from that unit
00371         if (bus_message.to_addr == addr) {
00372                 bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_MESSAGE_ACK_TIMEOUT);
00373 
00374                 tx_queue_drop();
00375                 bus_reset_tx_status();
00376         }
00377 }

00380 
00381 ISR(ISR_BUS_USART_DATA) {
00382 }
00383 
00384 
00386 ISR(ISR_BUS_USART_RECV) {
00387         //Reset the bus timeout since we have received a character
00388         timer_bus_timeout = 0;
00389 
00390         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00391                 unsigned char data = UDR2;
00392         #endif
00393 
00394         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT_V2
00395                 unsigned char data = UDR1;
00396         #endif
00397 
00398         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_GENERAL_IO
00399                 unsigned char data = UDR1;
00400         #endif
00401 
00402 #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_ROTATOR_UNIT
00403                 unsigned char data = UDR1;
00404 #endif
00405                 
00406         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT
00407                 unsigned char data = UDR;
00408         #endif
00409 
00410         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_POWERMETER_PICKUP
00411                         unsigned char data = UDR;
00412         #endif          
00413         
00414         bus_status.char_count++;
00415 
00416         if (bus_status.flags & (1<< BUS_STATUS_PREAMBLE_FOUND_BIT)) {
00417                 //Check if this is a postamble
00418                 if ((data == 0xFD) && (bus_new_message.length == (bus_status.char_count-7))) {          
00419 
00420                         if ((bus_new_message.to_addr == bus_status.ext_addr) || (bus_new_message.to_addr == BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR)) {
00421                                 //Is the receiver ON? If not we don't parse the message since it's sent by ourself. This is needed because of the SYNC message if this
00422                                 //device is used as master.
00423                                 if (bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_RECEIVE_ON)) {
00424                                         //Is the checksum OK? In that case we add the new message to the RX queue, if not we send a NACK (not sent if it's a broadcast)
00425                                         if (calc_checksum == bus_new_message.checksum) {
00426                                                 //Is the message a PING message? If so we should send it to the PING list
00427                                                 if (bus_new_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_PING) {
00428                                                         if (bus_new_message.length > 1)
00429                                                                 bus_ping_new_stamp(bus_new_message.from_addr, bus_new_message.data[0], bus_new_message.length-1, (unsigned char *)(bus_new_message.data+1));
00430                                                         else
00431                                                                 bus_ping_new_stamp(bus_new_message.from_addr, bus_new_message.data[0], 0, 0);
00432                                                 }
00433                                                 else {
00434                                                         bus_add_new_message();
00435                                         
00436                                                         if (bus_new_message.flags & (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK))
00437                                                                 bus_send_ack(bus_new_message.from_addr);
00438                                                 }
00439                                         }
00440                                         else if (bus_new_message.to_addr != BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR) //SEND NACK
00441                                                 bus_send_nack(bus_new_message.from_addr, BUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR);
00442                                 }
00443                         }
00444                         
00445                         bus_reset_rx_status();
00446                         bus_status.prev_char = data;
00447                         return;
00448                 }
00449                 else {
00450                         switch(bus_status.char_count) {
00451                                 case 1 :        bus_new_message.from_addr = data;
00452                                                                         break;
00453                                 case 2 :        bus_new_message.to_addr = data;
00454                                                                         break;
00455                                 case 3 :        bus_new_message.checksum = data;
00456                                                                         break;
00457                                 case 4 :        bus_new_message.flags = data;
00458                                                                         calc_checksum += data;
00459                                                                         break;
00460                                 case 5 :        bus_new_message.cmd = data;
00461                                                                         calc_checksum += data;
00462                                                                         break;
00463                                 case 6 :        bus_new_message.length = data;
00464                                                                         calc_checksum += data;
00465                                                                         break;
00466                                 default:        bus_new_message.data[bus_status.char_count - 7] = data;
00467 
00468                                                                         //The command is a SYNC message, reset the timer
00469                                                                         if (bus_new_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_SYNC) {
00470                                                                                 TCNT2 = 0;      //Clear the counter so that all units have about the same baseline
00471                                                                                 
00472                                                                                 bus_status.device_count = data;
00473                                                                                 bus_status.device_count_mult = (data * BUS_TIME_MULTIPLIER);
00474 
00475                                                                                 bus_status.frame_counter = 0;
00476 
00477                                                                                 //Indicate that atleast one SYNC has been received
00478                                                                                 bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_ALLOWED_TO_SEND_BIT);
00479                                                                                 bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_MASTER_SENT_SYNC_BIT);
00480 
00481                                                                                 //Reset the counter keeping track of how long ago we last receieved a SYNC
00482                                                                                 //message from the master.
00483                                                                                 counter_sync_timeout = 0;
00484                                                                         }
00485 
00486                                                                         calc_checksum += data;
00487                                                                         break;
00488                         }
00489                 }
00490         }
00491         else if (data == 0xFE) {
00492                 //Is this a preamble or just a variable sent?
00493                 if (bus_status.char_count >= 2)
00494                         if (bus_status.prev_char == 0xFE) {
00495                                 bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_ALLOWED_TO_SEND_BIT);
00496                                 bus_status.char_count = 0;
00497                                 calc_checksum = 0;
00498                                 bus_status.flags |= (1 << BUS_STATUS_PREAMBLE_FOUND_BIT);
00499                         }
00500         }
00501 
00502         bus_status.prev_char = data;
00503 }
00504 
00506 ISR(ISR_BUS_USART_TRANS) {
00507         if (!(bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_SEND_ACTIVE)))
00508                 bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_RECEIVE_ON);
00509 }
00510 
00512 ISR(ISR_BUS_TIMER_COMPARE) {
00513         /* If the bus hasn't received a message in a certain amount of time we clear it's status
00514            allowing other devices to transmit data again */
00515         if (timer_bus_timeout >= BUS_TIMEOUT_LIMIT) {
00516                 bus_reset_rx_status();
00517 
00518                 timer_bus_timeout = 0;
00519         }
00520 
00521         //If we have not received a sync within a certain time we stop all communication
00522         //until we receive a new sync again
00523         if (!bus_is_master() && (counter_sync_timeout >= BUS_SYNC_TIMEOUT_LIMIT)) {
00524                 bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_MASTER_SENT_SYNC_BIT);
00525                 
00526                 //Drops all current messages in the TX queue
00527                 tx_queue_dropall();
00528 
00529                 counter_sync_timeout = 0;
00530                 
00531                 #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00532                         event_set_error(ERROR_TYPE_BUS_SYNC,1);
00533                         led_set_error(LED_STATE_ON);
00534                 #endif
00535         }
00536 
00537         if (bus_status.wraparounds >= BUS_ACK_WRAPAROUND_LIMIT) {
00538                 if (bus_status.flags & (1<<BUS_STATUS_MESSAGE_ACK_TIMEOUT)) {
00539                         bus_resend_message();
00540                         
00541                         bus_status.wraparounds = 0;
00542                 }
00543         }
00544 
00545         if (bus_status.device_count != 0) {
00546                 if (((bus_status.frame_counter) >= bus_status.lower_limit) && ((bus_status.frame_counter) < bus_status.upper_limit)) {
00547                         bus_status.flags |= (1<<BUS_STATUS_TIME_SLOT_ACTIVE);
00548                 }
00549                 else {
00550                         bus_status.flags &= ~(1<<BUS_STATUS_TIME_SLOT_ACTIVE);
00551                 }
00552 
00553                 if (bus_status.frame_counter >= bus_status.device_count_mult) {
00554                         bus_status.frame_counter = 0;
00555                         bus_status.wraparounds++;
00556                 }
00557                 else
00558                         bus_status.frame_counter++;
00559         }
00560 
00561         //Will update with 1.04 ms intervals
00562         if ((counter_130us % 8) == 0) {
00563                 counter_sync_timeout++;
00564         }
00565         
00566         counter_130us++;
00567         timer_bus_timeout++;
00568 }
00569 
00570 #endif
